description: Défis Foyers is an initiative organized by the Sungo territorial food project in Southern Alsace. Its goal is to educate families about positive eating habits through various workshops, including farm visits, cooking sessions, and discussions on food waste and local sourcing. Over four months, participants earn points by engaging in activities that promote sustainable food practices, ultimately aiming to transform their dietary habits while demonstrating that healthy eating can be budget-friendly.
name: Défis Foyers
